title: APSIT NOTIFY
description: A comprehensive notification system for college students.
modal_content:
A React-based web app for scheduling reminders with secure login and real-time alerts via 
EmailJS and on-screen notifications
Key Features:
- Secure Login System
- Real-time Email Alerts (EmailJS)
- Responsive Dashboard
- Scheduled Reminders

description: A Python desktop application with admin and employee roles, enabling inventory management and bill generation using local file storage.
modal_content:
A desktop application for small businesses to manage billing and inventory.

Tech Stack: Python, Tkinter
Features:
- Admin/Employee Login
- Invoice Generation
- Inventory Tracking
title: Retail Billing System

description: Designed a Static Website for a clothing business where customers can browse and buy clothes.
modal_content:

- Responsive Grid Layouts
- Product Showcases
title: QUICKDEAL

description: A college app for students and faculty for pushing notices, alerts, event updates, and sharing study materials.
modal_content:
